metadata.title: USN-4200-1 -- Redmine vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Redmine incorrectly handle certain inputs that could cause textile formatting errors. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a XSS attack. (CVE-2019-17427)  It was discovered that an SQL injection could allow users to access protected information via a crafted object query. (CVE-2019-18890)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4200-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  redmine - 3.2.1-2ubuntu0.2 redmine-sqlite - 3.2.1-2ubuntu0.2 redmine-mysql - 3.2.1-2ubuntu0.2 redmine-pgsql - 3.2.1-2ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
